name: Light Leftover Chicken Lunch
author: Schultz Megan
summary: Easy to prepare and yummy tote-along lunch. Great if you have leftover chicken from the night before. Or leave the chicken out for a vegan option.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons soy sauce, or more to taste
1 dash ground cinnamon, or more to taste
2 teaspoons minced fresh ginger, or more to taste
directions: Bring water, rice, lentils, 1 tablespoon olive oil, and salt to a boil in a pot over medium heat
Cover and simmer until rice is tender, about 20 minutes
Microwave peas on high in a microwave-safe bowl until partially thawed, 20 to 30 seconds
Microwave chicken on high in a microwave-safe bowl for about 45 seconds
Coat the bottom of a serving dish with 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
Fill dish with the lentil-rice mixture, the chicken-pea mixture, and ginger; toss until evenly distributed
